Name: Chocolate
About the game: Set to the song of the same name by Giraffage, Chocolate is a wondrous experience that transforms your hands into cannons that spray cute, colorful chrome kittens onto a circle of people performing a ritualistic dance just for you, their robot god. You shoot giant shock waves into the vast, liquid-like landscape while a herd of giant cat heads migrates in the distance, and a massive tribal chief cat sprays champagne all over you. Everything is shiny and glimmering, smooth and sexy, cute and strange, overwhelming and astonishing. Chocolate VR is SubPac Optimized: /
